name: Branch_GetAllBranches
description: Get a range of Branches - ScreenId=CS101500

greaterThanValue.description: Filter by branch ID (number) greater than.

lastModifiedDateTime.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

lastModifiedDateTimeCondition.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

expandAddress.description: True to get main address for branch.

expandContact.description: True to get main contact for a branch.

expandCurrency.description: True to get base currency for a branch.

expandVatZone.description: True to get vat zone for a branch.

expandLedger.description: True to get ledger for a branch.

expandIndustryCode.description: True to get industry code for a branch.

expandDeliveryAddress.description: True to get delivery address for a branch.

expandDeliveryContact.description: True to get delivery contact for a branch.

expandDefaultCountry.description: True to get default country for a branch.

expandBankSettings.description: True to get payment settings for Branch.

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$ul: **branchId**: The top part > Branch ID* > The unique identifier of the Branch
**corporateId**: The Organisation details tab > VAT registration info section > Corporate ID > The corporate ID of the company.
**currency**: The Organisation details tab > Base currency settings (shared) section > This group of elements holds information that is shared among all branches of the company.

**defaultCountry**: Mandatory field: The organisation details tab > Configuration settings section > Default country* > The default country, which is the country of most of the company's customers and suppliers.
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**deliveryAddress**: The Delivery settings tab > Delivery address section >
**addressLine1**: Address 1 > The first line of the customer's/supplier's/company's/employee's contact address.
**addressLine2**: Address 2 > The second line of the address.
**addressLine3**: Address 3 > The third line of the address.
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**deliveryContact**: The Delivery settings tab > Delivery contact section >

**attention**: Attention > The attention line as it is used in your customer's/supplier's/company's business letters. The intention of this line is to direct the letter to the right person if the letter is not addressed to any specific person.
**email**: Email > The email address of the customer/supplier/company as a business entity.
**name**: Name > The legal name of to appear on the documents.
**web**: Web > The website of the company, if one exists.
**industryCode**: The Organisation details tab > Configuration settings section > Industry code > The branch's industry code ID.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**isActive**: The top part > Is active branch.
**isMainBranch**: The top part > Is main organisation > If you want this company to be the main company of your branches, select this check box.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: System generated information. This information is not visible in the window.
**ledger**: The ledgers tab > The ledger column and the Description column.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**mainAddress**: The Organisation details tab > The Main address section >
**addressLine1**: Address 1 > The first line of the customer's/supplier's/company's/employee's contact address.
**addressLine2**: Address 2 > The second line of the address.
**addressLine3**: Address 3 > The third line of the address.
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**mainContact**: The Organisation details tab >  The Main contact section >

**attention**: Attention > The attention line as it is used in your customer's/supplier's/company's business letters. The intention of this line is to direct the letter to the right person if the letter is not addressed to any specific person.
**email**: Email > The email address of the customer/supplier/company as a business entity.
**name**: Name > The legal name of to appear on the documents.
**web**: Web > The website of the company, if one exists.
**name**: The top part > Company name > The name of the company.
**number**: Mandatory field: The top part > Branch CD* > The branch number , which you compose according to the rules defined by the BIZACCT segmented key.
**vatRegistrationId**: The Organisation details tab > VAT registration info section > VAT registration ID > The company registration ID for the countryâ€™s tax authority.
**vatZone**: The Delivery settings tab > Delivery instruction section > VAT zone ID > The VAT zone of the delivery location.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
